thread.section_title: TripAdvisor Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TripAdvisor | www.tripadvisor.com
thread.title: David Bates

author: David Bates
title: David Bates
text:
Noak Bridge Pub off Wash Rd Basildon. Been going to this pub even before name changed and have always had great food and service. Last wednesday and friday thats 8/3/17 and 10/3/17 both nights served by the loverly Carly. Sevice was great and the food Whow!. Both nights i had Steak and must be Mediam Rare and they were cooked with perfection. also the evening and surroundings were spot on.Thank You
We'll be back. D.Bates
